scripts.build:all: yarn build api && yarn build react-gql && yarn build ui && yarn build web
scripts.build:dev: yarn build api && yarn build react-gql && yarn build ui
scripts.deploy:prod: git add . && git commit -m 'chore(deploy): Merge staging -> prod' && git checkout prod && git merge staging && git push origin prod --force && git checkout staging
scripts.lint: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude @oasis-sh/react-gql -p run prettify && yarn workspaces foreach --exclude @oasis-sh/react-gql -p run lint
scripts.reinstall: yarn clean || rimraf packages/**/*.sqlite || yarn install
scripts.setup:remote: yarn workspace @oasis-sh/web run setup:remote && yarn build react-gql && yarn build ui
scripts.test:api:setup: yarn build api && TESTING=true yarn dev:api
scripts.test:cy:run-web: TESTING=true concurrently "yarn workspace @oasis-sh/web dev" "yarn workspace @oasis-sh/ui build:watch"
